name: SpontaneousOrElectiveAbortion
title: Spontaneous or Elective Abortion
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Intended to capture loss of pregnancy.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis or Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes miscarriage, abortion, tubal or ectopic pregnancy's.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that do not indicate a condition of loss of pregnancy.)
